channel.title: A few bugs I need help fixing
channel.description:
First of all, when people are on second/third floor and they type a command they are stuck in the air and are surrounded by black. But the bad part about it is that they can travel anywhere on the map. And my server is island based...
The second thing is that in the kalphite dungeon, you cannot see any hp bars over peoples'/your/monster's heads nor text.
If anyone knows how to fix either of these, please let me know.
Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2007, 01:39:17 PM[/size][hr]anyone know?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2007, 02:18:54 PM[/size][hr]Nobody?

LeScape Pk:

My moparscape client is 377…OWNED

Not that hard to do

But yeah for the first glitch you have to use heightlevel commands too. As posted above.

item.title: A few bugs I need help fixing
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“command here”)) {//command name
teleportToX = x coord;//x coord
teleportToY = y coord;//y coord
heightLevel = 0;//hightlevel 0 is ground
}

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=T6F7ODID <— 377 client

Read full topic
item.source: A few bugs I need help fixing

item.title: A few bugs I need help fixing
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

add

heightLevel = #;

in your tele commands

Read full topic
item.source: A few bugs I need help fixing

item.title: A few bugs I need help fixing
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

The Kalphite glitch happens on the moparscape client because it does not fully support the Kalphite Queen. So anybody by it gets affected too when they use the MoparScape client. Make your own client and get a 377 cache, that’ll solve the problem.

Oh and, dont triple post.

Read full topic
item.source: A few bugs I need help fixing
